articles.title: Coolio discovered with three bags of drugs following tragic fentanyl overdose death at 59 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Following news that Coolio died at 59, the coroner's report indicates that three bags of drugs and paraphernalia belonging to him were found near his body at a friend's home in Los Angeles.
articles.content:
Multiple bags containing drugs, as well as paraphernalia, were discovered near the body of the late rapper Coolio.
